## Checklist before opening the pr

- [ ] Tested locally
- [ ] Tested on the machine (if hardware interaction is involved)
- [ ] No format errors (`cargo fmt` / `npm run format`)
- [ ] No build errors (`cargo build` / `npm run build`)
